segments.text: As an experienced interviewer , could you tell me what kind of behavior the interviewer hates most ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Rudeness . You are not expected to sit down before being invited , and you shouldn ’ t throw yourself into the chair like you ’ re loading heavy baggage .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And we should have good sitting posture .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s right . The ideal posture for women is to put their legs together and lean to one side . This is especially important in summer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Where should I put my overcoat and briefcase after entering the office ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Put it beside you . Don ’ t pile your purses , briefcase and other belongings on the employer ’ s desk . You've got long hair . Don ’ t touch it while talking to the interviewer . It gives people the feeling that you cannot concentrate on your work .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think that ’ s the reason why Princess Diana ’ s hair style became so popular .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Also , if you are asked to sit beside the employer's desk , neither lean on it nor look at the documents there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ought to respect other people ’ s privacy , as most Westerners do .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: As the saying goes , when in Rome , do as the Romans do .
segments.speaker: S2
